name: RTL PLZ Handoff
description:
Currently, in Figma If an RTL text is readable to you, that will unreadable for developers or users that want to copy the original text. This plugin makes a big frame over your document and duplicates text layers with the original text, so when the developer tries to select a text layer, the replica layer with original text will be selected.

How to use: Select some layer with RTL text (that written with the RTL PLZ plugin) and run the plugin.

Layers that have LTR text or written with other tools are currently being skipped.
